      java.util.Map<Vertex,java.awt.geom.Path2D> Voronoi.makeVoronoiPolygons(Vertex[] vertices, java.util.List<GraphEdge> edges)
      Given a list of vertices and a list of voronoi edges, computes a set of polygons, each representing a Voronoi region, then finds the vertex in that region and constructs a map from vertex to region.

      Given a list of vertices and a list of voronoi edges, computes a set of polygons, each representing a Voronoi region, then finds the vertex in that region and constructs a map from vertex to region.

      static double Vertex.triArea(Vertex pt1, Vertex pt2, Vertex pt3)
      Computes twice the area of the oriented triangle (pt1, pt2, pt3) (the area is positive if the triangle is oriented counterclockwise).
